data.decision: Phase 1 Feedback Loop MVP implemented: episodes/, evaluations/, skill_stats/ directories created; schemas.py updated with Episode, Evaluation, SkillStats schemas plus backward_compat defaults; artifacts.py updated with store_episode, update_episode, store_evaluation, apply_evaluation methods; duro_mcp_server.py updated with 8 new tools (create_episode, add_episode_action, close_episode, evaluate_episode, apply_evaluation, get_episode, list_episodes, suggest_episode); 5 core skill stats seeded.
data.rationale: Phase 1 implementation completed per user-approved plan with refinements: normalized scores 0-5, tokens_bucket enum, confidence capped 0.05-0.99, deltas capped +/-0.02, stored_confidence vs effective_confidence (computed), usage counters, backward compat defaults for old artifacts.
data.context: Building the compounding engine - feedback loop first before expanding tools
